greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,k) with diagonals T(n,n-k) = binomial(n, 4k).
program: (MAGMA) [[Binomial(n, 4*(n-k)): k in [0..n]]: n in [0..12]]; // _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 15 2019
(Sage) [[binomial(n, 4*(n-k)) for k in (0..n)] for n in (0..12)] # _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 15 2019
(GAP) Flat(List([0..12], n-> List([0..n], k-> Binomial(n, 4*(n-k)) ))); # _G. C. Greubel_, Mar 15 2019
results.author: _Paul Barry_, Aug 30 2004
